- Step into a golf-themed retreat with a private putting green and arcade games 
- Relax in the heated pool and hot tub surrounded by palm trees and loungers 
- Enjoy spacious, golf-inspired interiors with a gourmet kitchen for group meals 
- Located centrally with easy access to Championship Golf and Scottsdale hotspots
- Book your stay now and experience the perfect blend of fun and relaxation
